title: Looking for t206 Cobb green portrait - trade
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking for t206 Cobb green portrait - trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dan
I just posted some t206's, Misc s74 silks, and a few T202 plus a Hassan cigarette pack on photobucket and would like to trade for a t206 Cobb green portrait any condition.  let me know if I have anything you would want. I can send you better scans if need be. Thank you, Dan

Cards are listed at   [url]http://s643.photobucket.com/albums/uu154/michlegal[/url]/
